amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the National Guard State Partnership Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 342 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 342 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Schatz. (consideration: CR S1980; text: CR S1980) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the National Guard State Partnership Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 342 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 342 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Schatz.
